title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 336.13 - Action by chief administrative officer
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 336.13 - Action by chief administrative officer

State Regulations

Notwithstanding anything contained herein, the chief
administrative officer of a college may promote, or recommend for promotion
directly to the chancellor or designee, any professional employee in the

Professional Services Negotiating Unit at the chief administrative officer's
college. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
336.13

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
